languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс на мгновение прикрывает глаза, словно первая же ваша реплика сбила его, заставив забыть заготовленную речь.{/n} "Мое почтение, Вольный Торговец".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс на мгновение прикрывает глаза, словно первая же ваша реплика сбила его, заставив забыть заготовленную речь.{/n} "Мое почтение, Вольный Торговец".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix momentarily closes his eyes, as if your first remark has thrown him off and made him forget the speech he prepared.{/n} "Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс на мгновение прикрывает глаза, словно первая же ваша реплика сбила его, заставив забыть заготовленную речь.{/n} "Мое почтение, Вольный Торговец".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix momentarily closes his eyes, as if your very first remark threw him off and made him forget the speech he had prepared.{/n} "Rogue Trader."

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは、まるであなたが発した一言で用意してきたスピーチを忘れてしまったと言わんばかりに、一瞬目を閉じる。{/n}「自由開拓者」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix momentarily closes his eyes, as if your first remark has thrown him off and made him forget the speech he prepared.{/n} "Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは、まるであなたが発した一言で用意してきたスピーチを忘れてしまったと言わんばかりに、一瞬目を閉じる。{/n}「自由開拓者」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix ferme les yeux un instant, comme si votre première remarque l'avait déstabilisé au point d'oublier le discours qu'il avait préparé.{/n} « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix momentarily closes his eyes, as if your first remark has thrown him off and made him forget the speech he prepared.{/n} "Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix ferme les yeux un instant, comme si votre remarque l'avait déstabilisé au point d'oublier le discours qu'il avait préparé.{/n} « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: {n}海因里希闭上眼睛，呆立片刻。看起来，你的第一句话就让他吃了一惊，连原本准备好的说辞都忘光了。{/n}“行商浪人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix momentarily closes his eyes, as if your first remark has thrown him off and made him forget the speech he prepared.{/n} "Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希闭上眼睛，呆立片刻。看起来，你的第一句话就让他吃了一惊，连原本准备好的说辞都忘光了。{/n}“行商浪人。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix schließt kurz die Augen, als hätte ihn deine erste Anmerkung aus dem Konzept gebracht und seine vorbereitete Ansprache vergessen lassen.{/n} "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}!"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix momentarily closes his eyes, as if your first remark has thrown him off and made him forget the speech he prepared.{/n} "Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix schließt kurz die Augen, als hätte ihn deine erste Anmerkung aus dem Konzept gebracht und seine vorbereitete Ansprache vergessen lassen."{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}!"

languages.text: {n}Heinrix cierra los ojos por un momento, como si tu primer comentario le hubiese descolocado y le hiciera olvidar el discurso que se había preparado.{/n} «Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix momentarily closes his eyes, as if your first remark has thrown him off and made him forget the speech he prepared.{/n} "Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix cierra los ojos por un momento, como si tu comentario le descolocase y le hiciera olvidar el discurso que se había preparado.{/n} «Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, tepkin onu hazırlıksız yakalamış ve hazırladığı konuşmayı unutturmuş gibi bir anlığına gözlerini kapatıyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix momentarily closes his eyes, as if your first remark has thrown him off and made him forget the speech he prepared.{/n} "Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix söylediklerin onu şaşırtmış ve hazırladığı konuşmayı unutturmuş gibi gözlerini kapatıyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir."
